title: 91/218/EEC: Commission Decision of 26 March 1991 approving the plan for the eradication of brucellosis in sheep and goats presented by the Hellenic Republic (Only the Greek text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 26 March 1991  approving the plan for the eradication of brucellosis in sheep and goats presented by the Hellenic Republic  (Only the Greek text is authentic)  (91/218/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN  COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Article 1
The plan for the eradication of brucellosis in sheep and goats presented by the Hellenic Republic is hereby approved.  Article 2
The Hellenic Republic shall bring into force by 1 June 1991 the laws, regulations and administrative provisions for implementing the plan referred to in Article 1.  Article 3
This Decision is addressed to the Hellenic Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 March 1991. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission  (1) OJ No L 140, 1. 6. 1990, p. 123.
